title: Full Stack Developer
summary: Versatile full-stack developer with expertise in modern web technologies and cloud platforms. Experienced in building scalable applications using React, Node.js, and cloud services. Strong foundation in both front-end and back-end development with a focus on creating efficient, user-centric solutions. Proven track record of delivering complex projects from conception to deployment.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Developed full-stack solutions integrating various technologies and platforms.
highlights: Built responsive web applications using React, Node.js, and modern JavaScript frameworks
Developed RESTful APIs and integrated with third-party services
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using Git, GitLab, and Azure DevOps
Created automated testing suites improving code quality and reducing bugs by 40%
Optimized application performance resulting in 50% faster load times

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Developed enterprise applications and custom solutions for global clients.
highlights: Built reusable UI components and implemented responsive design patterns
Developed backend services handling 10K+ daily transactions
Integrated applications with databases and external APIs
Participated in Agile development processes and code reviews
Mentored junior developers on best practices and coding standards

projects.title: GitHub Pages Resume Portfolio
projects.description: Modern, modular resume website with role-switching capability.
projects.details: Built using vanilla JavaScript ES6 modules with component-based architecture. Features dark mode, responsive design, and dynamic content loading.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce application with payment integration.
projects.details: MERN stack application with user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, and Stripe payment integration.

projects.title: Real-Time Chat Application
projects.description: WebSocket-based chat app with real-time messaging.
projects.details: Built with Socket.io for real-time communication, featuring private rooms, file sharing, and message history.

projects.title: Task Management System
projects.description: Collaborative project management tool with team features.
projects.details: Full-featured task tracker with drag-and-drop, real-time updates, and team collaboration capabilities.
